name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Octoparse VOC - AI Review Research & Analysis

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI consumer review research extension by Octoparse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your review research with Octoparse VOC's AI-powered tools: product research, competitor analysis, sentiment analysis, customer Q&A highlights, and more!

Browse review webpages, input product URLs or keywords, or upload review data files to generate quick or deep consumer insights reports.

The Octoparse VOC extension helps business aggregate, analyze, and understand the voices of their niche faster than ever before.

== Octoparse VOC Benefits ==

Review intelligence at your fingertips
Say goodbye to waiting on agency reports and say hello to reliable review insights - fast. Octoparse VOC identifies customer pain points, drivers, and sentiment across different contact sources and turns them into a complete data-driven voice of customer picture for you.

Actionable insights tailored to your business
Octoparse VOC is not just about getting customer reviews, but turning them into actionable insights and practical next steps that better your business. We showcases where and how you win market share against competitors so you can sky rocket to the top.

Turn AI potential into scalable results
Understand your customer reviews in one-tenth of the time, with the power of AI. Octoparse VOC taps into the power of the latest LLMs so you can stop relying on general text analytics & manual analysis and create human-quality insights reports at scale.

== Octopares VOC Features ==

➤ Analyze on Page
Bring the power of AI to every Amazon product detail page you visit with the Octoparse VOC Extension. Create quick review insights reports and data-driven buyer personas directly on page with just a single click. 

➤ Aggregate with Ease
Input multiple URLs, keywords, or ASINs from a product profolio and let Octoparse VOC navigate the reviews for you. Generate review highlights in minutes without losing the essence of the original review content.

➤ Compare with Clarity
Apply comparisons to reports and see how your product portfolios are faring against competitors in a side-by-side chart view. Identify gaps in your product or service offerings to pinpoint critical areas for improvement.

➤ Dive into the Q&As
What concerns do buyers have pre-purchase? Which specific pain points should you address first? What messages resonate more effectively? Let Octoparse VOC read the Customer Q&As first and answer it for you.

== Frequently Asked Questions ==

Q: Does Octoparse VOC support other platforms other than Amazon?
A: Currently the Octoparse VOC extension is only compatible with 6 Amazon country/region websites (UK, US, CA, JP, DE & FR). Support for Temu and other e-commerce platforms are on the way. You can upload review files collected from other platforms to conduct a custom review analysis. 

Ready to transform the way you conduct review research? Get started for free today!

Learn more:  https://voc.octoparse.com
